Class TaskController

java.lang.Object
com.app.taskmanager.contoller.TaskController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/tasks") public class TaskController extends Object
REST controller for managing tasks.

Provides reactive endpoints for creating, updating, retrieving, listing, and deleting tasks. All responses are returned as Mono instances.
